examplePhrases: Alexa, ask radio RMF FM to play
en-US.name: Radio 357
en-US.description:
Plays radio RMF FM Poland on your Alexa device!
Simply say one of the following:
- "Alexa, open radio RMF FM" 
- "Alexa, use radio RMF FM"
- "Alexa, start radio RMF FM"
- "Alexa, ask radio RMF FM to play"

Say "Alexa stop" to stop playing.

Can also play the national anthem.

Have you found a bug?
Send me an email!
coolbigbear.contact@gmail.com
